text: Nocardioides aromaticivorans is a gram-positive non-motile bacterium from the genus Nocardioides thathas been isolated from a river contaminated with dioxin in Kanagawa, Japan.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Nocardioides aromaticivorans has the ability to degrade dibenzofuran and carbazole. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides aromaticivorans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase aromaticivorans Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Nocardioides aromaticivorans
